name: peoples_architect_of_the_URSS
description: Awarded in order of contribution to realization of stunning constructions

name: 4_honoured_pilot_of_the_USSR
displayName: Honoured Test Pilot of the USSR
description: Awarded for for creative work in the field of testing and research of new aviation technologies

name: medal_honoured_pilot_of_the_urss
description: Awarded to qualified pilots  for special merit in the development of modern aircraft, in the use of the most advanced piloting techniques, for the highest standards in education and training of flight personnel, for long-term trouble-free flying and for outstanding achievements in the use of aviation in the national economy

name: hero_of_the_soviet_union
description: The highest honorary title that could be given to both Soviet civilians and soldiers for a heroic act

name: order_for_service_to_the_homeland_in_the_armed_forces_of_the_USSR
displayName: Order for Service to the Homeland in the Armed Forces of the USSR
description: Awarded for exemplary service in the armed forces, both during a war and during peacetime

name: peolpe_doctor_of_the_urss
description: Awarded for worthwhile contributions to public health improvement.

name: 2_honoured_navigator_of_the_USSR
displayName: Honoured Military Navigator of the USSR
description: Awarded to members of military flying units, military agencies, military schools, military organizations and other military or federal authorities, having qualified military navigators 1st class or military navigator-instructors 1st class, for outstanding achievements in the development of aviation technology, high performance in education and training of flight personnel and long-term trouble-free flight operations in military aviation

name: 3_honoured_navigator_of_the_USSR
displayName: Honoured Test Navigator of the USSR
description: Awarded to military and civilian test-pilots 1st class of the civilian aircraft industry and of the Ministry of Defence of the USSR, for multiple years of creative work in the field of testing and research of new aviation technologies

name: pilot_cosmonaut_of_the_USSR
description: Awarded by the Presidium of the Supreme Soviet for the outstanding contribution in the Soviet Space Program achievements
